name: Short Fuse Saloon
description:
Imagine being a cowboy in the Wild West. Imagine stepping into a saloon, having a glass of whiskey and then fighting anyone who dares to look at you. Seems fun?

Now imagine being the barman who has to put up with you and all other idiotic customers. Even better - be the barman in Short Fuse Saloon and try to remain cool and keep your customers from killing each other while every drunk cowboy in the west is trying to squeeze through your doors.
